item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Mermaid Graphs
item.description: Here’s a simple mermaid flowchart. graph LR Start -- Stop For more documentations on Mermaid, view mermaid.

item.title: What is Hugo
item.description: Hugo is a fast and modern static site generator written in Go, and designed to make website creation fun again.
